CONCLUSION: Remainder inadmissible (Article 35-3-b - No significant disadvantage);No violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Civil proceedings;Article 6-1 - Reasonable time)
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE - on - Don .
CARDINAL . The applicant is a ORG colonel .
CARDINAL . In DATE he was removed from his post .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought proceedings against his commanding officer claiming reinstatement , payment of salary and service - related benefits , and compensation of non - pecuniary damage sustained as a result of his removal .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of PERSON ( “ the ORG ” ) dismissed his claims ; the judgment was upheld on appeal .

CARDINAL . In DATE a military disciplinary commission issued an appraisal report in respect of the applicant . The commission found that the applicant 's performance was unsatisfactory . On this basis in DATE he was transferred from active military service to the reserve .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant challenged the transfer in court , but to no avail . On DATE ORG dismissed his claim ; the judgment was upheld on appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE president of ORG of ORG of GPE granted the applicant 's application for supervisory review and brought an extraordinary appeal against the above court decisions .
CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG of ORG quashed the impugned decisions and remitted the cases for fresh examination .
CARDINAL . On an unspecified date ORG joined the above cases .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG granted the applicant 's claims in part . It quashed the respective decisions of the applicant 's superior officers and the appraisal report , reinstated him in his former post and awarded him non - pecuniary damages in the amount of MONEY ( RUB ) , to be recovered from ORG , and RUB CARDINAL to be recovered from the Chief of the ORG of the North - Caucasus Military Command . The claims for pecuniary damages were rejected .
CARDINAL . On DATE the appeal court set aside the judgment in the part concerning rejection of the claims for pecuniary damages and required a new hearing . The remainder of the judgment was upheld .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG issued a writ of execution in respect of the part of the judgment that had entered into force and forwarded it to the bailiff service of LOC .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was reinstated in his post . The damages in the amount of RUB CARDINAL awarded by the judgment of CARDINAL DATE remained unpaid .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG granted the applicant 's claims in part , awarding him RUB CARDINAL . However , on DATE the appeal court overturned this judgment on procedural grounds and ordered the case for re - examination .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG granted most of the applicant 's claims . The court awarded him RUB CARDINAL covering his salary , legal expenses and various service - related benefits due for the period of his necessary absence from work , in particular , compensation for clothing , food ration , sanatoria treatment and a lump - sum premium for DATE .

CARDINAL . The court also found that the applicant 's reinstatement ordered by the judgment of DATE had been carried out with a significant delay , and that the applicant had not received RUB CARDINAL awarded by the court in compensation of non - pecuniary damage . The applicant was awarded RUB CARDINAL as compensation for the delayed enforcement .
CARDINAL . This judgment was upheld on appeal by ORG of ORG on DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received RUB CARDINAL due to him under the decision of DATE . The award of RUB CARDINAL remained unpaid .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE the applicant received the amounts awarded to him by the court judgment of DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant brought proceedings claiming index - linking of the amounts paid to him with a delay .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG granted his claims in part , awarding him RUB CARDINAL as inflation losses resulted from the delay in the enforcement of the judgments of CARDINAL DATE and DATE . However , without giving any specific reasons the court rejected the applicant 's claim in the part concerning the failure to pay him RUB CARDINAL .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG upheld the judgment on appeal .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received the amount awarded to him by the judgment of DATE . It appears that the applicant has not received the award of RUB CARDINAL to date .

CARDINAL . Federal Law № CARDINAL-ФЗ of DATE ( in force as of CARDINAL DATE ) provides that in case of a violation of the right to trial within a reasonable time or of the right to enforcement of a final judgment , the NORP citizens are entitled to seek compensation of the non - pecuniary damage . ORG CARDINAL-ФЗ adopted on DATE introduced the pertinent changes in the NORP legislation .

CARDINAL . Section CARDINAL of LAW CARDINAL-ФЗ provides that everyone who has a pending application before ORG concerning a complaint of the nature described in the law has DATE to bring the complaint to the domestic courts .
